statements: SELECT panel_id, location, capacity, installation_date FROM solar_panels;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT location, panel_id FROM solar_panels WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM solar_panels ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, location FROM solar_panels WHERE location ILIKE '%south%';
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY installation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT panel_id, location, capacity FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY location, installation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, location, capacity, installation_date FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity < 50 AND location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY capacity ASC, location;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY location, capacity DESC;
SELECT panel_id, location, installation_date FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity > 75 AND location IN ('Texas', 'Florida', 'Arizona') ORDER BY panel_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM solar_panel_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM panel_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT panel_id, status FROM panel_status ORDER BY last_status_update DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM solar_panel_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM solar_panel_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM solar_panel_locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT p.status, p.last_status_update, l.location_name FROM panel_status p JOIN solar_panel_locations l ON p.panel_id = l.id ORDER BY p.last_status_update DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_panels, AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude, AVG(longitude) AS avg_longitude FROM solar_panel_locations;
SELECT * FROM Location;
SELECT location_id, address FROM Location ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanel WHERE brand='XYZ';
SELECT panel_id, wattage FROM SolarPanel ORDER BY wattage DESC;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Location WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
SELECT panel_id, brand, wattage FROM SolarPanel WHERE wattage >= 300;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, address FROM Location WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT panel_id, brand, location_id FROM SolarPanel JOIN Location ON SolarPanel.location_id = Location.location_id;
SELECT * FROM panel_location WHERE panel_id = 1
SELECT installation_date, installer FROM installation WHERE panel_id = 2
SELECT city, state, country FROM location
SELECT * FROM panel_status WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT panel_id, latitude, longitude FROM panel_location
SELECT * FROM panel_location;
SELECT installation_id, panel_id, installation_date FROM installation ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, city, state, country FROM location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT panel_id, location_id, latitude, longitude FROM panel_location WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT panel_id, status, last_maintenance FROM panel_status WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM panels;
SELECT panel_id, location, manufacturer FROM panels WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM installations ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, city, state FROM locations WHERE zip_code='12345';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, location, capacity FROM panels WHERE manufacturer = 'SunPower' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT installation_id, panel_id, installation_date, technician FROM installations WHERE technician = 'John Doe' AND installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
